3D Plotting
===========
.. currentmodule:: prob140

For interactive 3D plots, you may want to switch your backend if you are using
an iPython notebook.

Use ``%matplotlib notebook`` or ``%matplotlib qt`` instead of
``%matplotlib inline`` if you want to directly interact with the plot.

.. autosummary::
    :toctree: _autosummary

    Plot_3d
    Plot_bivariate_normal
    Scatter_multivariate_normal
